title: Abner Defects to David
summary: The war between the houses of Saul and David continues. Abner grows strong but falls out with Ish-Bosheth and defects to David. However, Joab kills Abner out of revenge, and David mourns him publicly.

faq.question: Why did Abner join David?
faq.answer: Because Ish-Bosheth accused him unfairly, and Abner saw David as the rightful king.

faq.question: What did Joab do to Abner?
faq.answer: He murdered him in revenge for killing his brother Asahel.
